mapper.select: SELECT e.equipment_id, e.equipmentNum, e.equipmentName, s.share_id, s.share_user_id, s.remark FROM tb_equipment e LEFT JOIN tb_user_share s ON e.equipment_id = s.equipment_id WHERE e.equipment_id = #{equipment_id} AND s.status = 1 ORDER BY e.equipment_id
SELECT * FROM tb_user_share s left join tb_user u on s.share_user_id = u.user_id WHERE s.equipment_id = #{equipment_id} AND s.status = 1
select * from tb_user_share s left join tb_equipment e on e.equipment_id = s.equipment_id where s.share_user_id = #{share_user_id} and s.status = 0
SELECT share_user_id from tb_user_share where equipment_id = #{equipment_id} and status = 0 limit 1
